title: M7892 Design Step P11
table_of_contents: Security Target and Target of Evaluation Reference
Firmware and software of the TOE
Additional Threat due to Loader Package Functionality
Additional Threat due to TOE specific Functionality
Security Objectives for the Development and Operational Environment
Clarification of “Protection during Composite product manufacturing (OE.Process-Sec-IC)”
Support of MAE and Flash Loader
Rationale for the Security Functional Requirements
Assignment of Security Functional Requirements to TOE’s Security Functionality

revisions.description: Updated user guidance. Introduced NRG terminology.Signatures for MAE lib is updated.
Accepted final remarks and provided minor editorial update.
